INTJ.name: The Architect
INTJ.description: INTJs are imaginative and strategic thinkers with a rational view of everything. They are independent, curious, and determined, with a strong curiosity and desire for knowledge, constantly seeking to understand and improve the world around them.

INTP.name: The Thinker
INTP.description: INTPs are innovative inventors with an endless thirst for knowledge. They are theoretical thinkers fascinated by logical systems and patterns. INTPs are independent, original thinkers who value intellectual stimulation above all.

ENTJ.name: The Commander
ENTJ.description: ENTJs are bold, assertive leaders who always seek challenges. They are decisive, confident, and skilled at organizing others and projects to achieve goals. ENTJs are natural leaders with a clear vision of how things should be done.

ENTP.name: The Debater
ENTP.description: ENTPs are smart, curious innovators who always challenge the status quo. They are witty, knowledgeable individuals who enjoy intellectual debates and exploring new possibilities. ENTPs are versatile, adaptable thinkers.

INFJ.name: The Advocate
INFJ.description: INFJs are creative, insightful individuals passionate about helping others. They are idealistic, organized thinkers with a strong sense of purpose. INFJs are empathetic, insightful individuals.

INFP.name: The Mediator
INFP.description: INFPs are poetic, kind, altruistic individuals who eagerly champion for what they believe is right. They are creative, empathetic individuals with strong values.

ENFJ.name: The Protagonist
ENFJ.description: ENFJs are charismatic, inspiring leaders passionate about helping others realize their potential. They are empathetic, organized individuals skilled at understanding and motivating others.

ENFP.name: The Campaigner
ENFP.description: ENFPs are passionate, creative, social individuals who always embrace new possibilities. They are extroverted, easygoing people who enjoy connecting with others and exploring new ideas.

ISTJ.name: The Logistician
ISTJ.description: ISTJs are practical, fact-focused, reliable individuals dedicated to responsibility. They are organized, systematic thinkers who value tradition and are committed to fulfilling promises.

ISFJ.name: The Defender
ISFJ.description: ISFJs are warm, conscientious guardians always ready to protect loved ones. They are practical, caring individuals who value stability and are dedicated to caring for others.

ESTJ.name: The Executive
ESTJ.description: ESTJs are organized, decisive individuals dedicated to achieving goals. They are practical, leadership-oriented individuals who value tradition and are committed to maintaining order.

ESFJ.name: The Consul
ESFJ.description: ESFJs are extremely caring, social, conscientious individuals always eager to help others. They are organized, cooperative thinkers who value harmony and are committed to maintaining social order.

ISTP.name: The Virtuoso
ISTP.description: ISTPs are bold, practical experimenters skilled with various tools. They are hands-on, analytical thinkers who value efficiency and are dedicated to understanding the world around them.

ISFP.name: The Adventurer
ISFP.description: ISFPs are flexible, charming artists always ready to explore new possibilities. They are artistic, sensitive thinkers who value beauty and are dedicated to exploring new possibilities.

ESTP.name: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.description: ESTPs are smart, energetic perceivers highly skilled at perception and adaptation. They are practical, adaptable thinkers who value action and are dedicated to experiencing life.

ESFP.name: The Entertainer
ESFP.description: ESFPs are spontaneous, energetic, enthusiastic performers who never have a dull moment. They are easygoing, extroverted thinkers who value fun and are dedicated to experiencing life.
